fields.text: Thank you for calling Forkable, San Francisco's lunch concierge, where we pick and deliver your next meal.
To place a new lunch order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our menu specialists.
To speak directly with a Forkable concierge, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a concierge.
If you need assistance with an existing order, press [INDEX].
To track your delivery status, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your delivery details.
To modify or cancel your order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to order support.
